verses.name: Ezekiel 48:1
verses.text: Now these are the names of the tribes. From the north end to the coast of the way of Hethlon, as one goeth to Hamath, Hazar–enan, the border of Damascus northward, to the coast of Hamath; for these are his sides east and west; a portion for Dan.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:2
verses.text: And by the border of Dan, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Asher.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:3
verses.text: And by the border of Asher, from the east side even unto the west side, a portion for Naphtali.
